class.name: zed_nodelets/ZEDWrapperNodelet
class.description: This is the main nodelet of the ROS interface for Stereolabs ZED Camera.

class.name: zed_nodelets/RgbdSensorsSyncNodelet
class.description: This is the nodelet for ZED Camera to provide sync messages.

class.name: zed_nodelets/RgbdSensorsDemuxNodelet
class.description: This is the nodelet for ZED Camera to demux messages synchronized with `zed_nodelets/RgbdSensorsSyncNodelet`.
